formalText: Bored frustrated no panic when they feel stressed when they look back over the week and they say they still feel stressed.
They have been worrying about the process of going to places and the process of that.
It sounds like some of the anxiety is actually frustration when they say stress, even anger.
They are feeling stressed because they spend more time at their partner's house than their own.

Except that then if they are at his place they will feel uncomfortable eating in the kitchen by themself because they don't live there and that feels weird to people are around that don't really work.
It's doing what they can to manage the anxieties that they have control over and it sounds like with the dinner situation.
They feel out of place at their partners places because they feel they can't even bring their own food there to keep in the fridge.

They don't know if it is a cop out or if it's he thinks his depression makes it so he can't physically do whatever saying and they think his depression is telling him he can't do that thing, but he could get around it.
They are doing more specialized things with makeing yarn patterns where they need certain colors, and they are thinking about doing that before they move.
